safetyDropCoverHoldOnDesc: If you are indoors, drop to the ground, take cover under a sturdy table or desk, and hold on until the shaking stops.
safetyIndoorsDesc: Stay inside until the shaking stops and you are sure it is safe to exit. Stay away from windows, glass, and anything that could fall.
safetyOutdoorsDesc: If you are outdoors, stay there. Move away from buildings, streetlights, and utility wires.
safetyDrivingDesc: Pull over to a clear location away from buildings, trees, overpasses, and utility wires. Stop and stay in the vehicle.
safetyAftershocksDesc: Be prepared for aftershocks. These secondary shockwaves are usually less violent than the main quake but can be strong enough to do additional damage.
